queries.query:
PREFIX ns1: <https://enpkg.commons-lab.org/kg/>
PREFIX ns2: <https://enpkg.commons-lab.org/module/>
SELECT ?submitted_taxon ?LabExtract (COUNT(?LCMSFeature) AS ?featureCount)
WHERE {
 ?LCMSFeature ns1:has_canopus_annotation ?Annotation .
 ?Annotation ns1:has_canopus_npc_class  <NPCClass> .
 ?LCMSFeatureList ns1:has_lcms_feature ?LCMSFeature.
 ?LCMSAnalysis ns1:has_lcms_feature_list ?LCMSFeatureList .
 ?LabExtract ns1:has_LCMS ?LCMSAnalysis .
 ?RawMaterial ns1:has_lab_process ?LabExtract .
 ?RawMaterial ns1:submitted_taxon ?submitted_taxon .
}
GROUP BY ?submitted_taxon ?LabExtract

PREFIX ns1: <https://enpkg.commons-lab.org/kg/>
PREFIX ns2: <https://enpkg.commons-lab.org/module/>
SELECT ?posFeature ?negFeature
WHERE {
 ?rawMaterial ns1:has_wd_id <WDTaxon> .
 ?rawMaterial ns1:has_lab_process ?labExtract .
 ?labExtract ns1:has_LCMS ?posAnalysis .
 ?posAnalysis a ns1:LCMSAnalysisPos .
 ?posAnalysis ns1:has_lcms_feature_list ?posFeatureList .
 ?posFeatureList ns1:has_lcms_feature ?posFeature .
 ?posFeature ns1:has_sirius_annotation ?posAnnotation .
 ?posAnnotation ns1:has_sirius_adduct xsd:string .
 ?posFeature ns1:has_retention_time ?posRT .
 ?posFeature ns1:has_parent_mass ?posMass .

 ?labExtract ns1:has_LCMS ?negAnalysis .
 ?negAnalysis a ns1:LCMSAnalysisNeg .
 ?negAnalysis ns1:has_lcms_feature_list ?negFeatureList .
 ?negFeatureList ns1:has_lcms_feature ?negFeature .
 ?negFeature ns1:has_sirius_annotation ?negAnnotation .
 ?negAnnotation ns1:has_sirius_adduct xsd:string .
 ?negFeature ns1:has_retention_time ?negRT .
 ?negFeature ns1:has_parent_mass ?negMass .

 FILTER (ABS(?posRT - ?negRT) <= 3)
 FILTER (ABS(?posMass - ?negMass) / ?posMass <= 0.000005)
}

PREFIX ns1: <https://enpkg.commons-lab.org/kg/>
PREFIX ns2: <https://enpkg.commons-lab.org/module/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?submittedTaxon
WHERE {
 ?extract a ns1:LabExtract .
 ?rawMaterial ns1:has_lab_process ?extract .
 ?rawMaterial ns1:submitted_taxon ?submittedTaxon .
}

PREFIX ns1: <https://enpkg.commons-lab.org/kg/>
PREFIX ns2: <https://enpkg.commons-lab.org/module/>
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?wikidataID
WHERE {
 ?rawMaterial ns1:has_wd_id <WDTaxon> .
 ?rawMaterial ns1:has_lab_process ?labExtract .
 ?labExtract ns1:has_LCMS ?lcmsAnalysis .
 ?lcmsAnalysis ns1:has_lcms_feature_list ?featureList .
 ?featureList ns1:has_lcms_feature ?feature .
 ?feature ns1:has_sirius_annotation ?siriusAnnotation .
 ?siriusAnnotation ns1:has_InChIkey2D ?inchiKey2D .
 ?inchiKey2D ns1:is_InChIkey2D_of ?chemicalEntity .
 ?chemicalEntity ns1:has_wd_id ?wikidataID .
}

PREFIX ns1: <https://enpkg.commons-lab.org/kg/>
SELECT ?sample (COUNT(?feature) AS ?featureCount)
WHERE {
 ?sample ns1:has_LCMS ?analysis .
 ?analysis a ns1:LCMSAnalysisPos .
 ?analysis ns1:has_lcms_feature_list ?feature_list .
 ?feature_list ns1:has_lcms_feature ?feature .
 ?feature ns1:has_canopus_annotation ?annotation .
 ?annotation ns1:has_canopus_npc_class <NPCClass> .
 ?annotation ns1:has_canopus_npc_class_prob ?prob .
 FILTER(?prob > 0.5)
}
GROUP BY ?sample
ORDER BY DESC(?featureCount)

PREFIX ns1: <https://enpkg.commons-lab.org/kg/>
PREFIX ns2: <https://enpkg.commons-lab.org/module/>
SELECT (COUNT(?feature) AS ?featureCount)
WHERE {
 ?feature ns1:has_sirius_annotation ?siriusAnnotation ;
 ns1:has_isdb_annotation ?isdbAnnotation .
 ?siriusAnnotation ns1:has_InChIkey2D ?inchiKey2D .
 ?isdbAnnotation ns1:has_InChIkey2D ?inchiKey2D .
 ?feature ns1:has_ionization ?ionization .
 FILTER (?ionization IN ("pos", "neg"))
}

PREFIX ns1: <https://enpkg.commons-lab.org/kg/>
PREFIX ns2: <https://enpkg.commons-lab.org/module/>
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>
SELECT ?featurePos ?retentionTimePos ?InChIkey2D
WHERE {
 ?rawMaterial ns1:has_wd_id <WDTaxon> .
 ?rawMaterial ns1:has_lab_process ?labExtract .
 ?labExtract ns1:has_LCMS ?analysisPos .
 ?analysisPos a ns1:LCMSAnalysisPos .
 ?analysisPos ns1:has_lcms_feature_list ?featureListPos .
 ?featureListPos ns1:has_lcms_feature ?featurePos .
 ?featurePos ns1:has_retention_time ?retentionTimePos .
 ?featurePos ns1:has_sirius_annotation ?siriusAnnotationPos .
 ?siriusAnnotationPos ns1:has_InChIkey2D ?InChIkey2D .
 ?labExtract ns1:has_LCMS ?analysisNeg .
 ?analysisNeg a ns1:LCMSAnalysisNeg .
 ?analysisNeg ns1:has_lcms_feature_list ?featureListNeg .
 ?featureListNeg ns1:has_lcms_feature ?featureNeg .
 ?featureNeg ns1:has_retention_time ?retentionTimeNeg .
 ?featureNeg ns1:has_sirius_annotation ?siriusAnnotationNeg .
 ?siriusAnnotationNeg ns1:has_InChIkey2D ?InChIkey2D .
 FILTER (ABS(?retentionTimePos - ?retentionTimeNeg) <= 3)
}

PREFIX ns1: <https://enpkg.commons-lab.org/kg/>
PREFIX ns2: <https://enpkg.commons-lab.org/module/>
SELECT ?retention_time ?parent_mass ?spec2vec_peak
WHERE {
 ?rawMaterial ns1:has_wd_id <WDTaxon> .
 ?rawMaterial ns1:has_lab_process ?labExtract .
 ?labExtract ns1:has_LCMS ?lcmsAnalysis .
 ?lcmsAnalysis a ns1:LCMSAnalysisPos .
 ?lcmsAnalysis ns1:has_lcms_feature_list ?featureList .
 ?featureList ns1:has_lcms_feature ?feature .
 ?feature ns1:has_retention_time ?retention_time .
 ?feature ns1:has_parent_mass ?parent_mass .
 ?feature ns1:has_spec2vec_doc ?spec2vecDoc .
 ?spec2vecDoc ns1:has_spec2vec_peak ?spec2vec_peak .
}

PREFIX ns1: <https://enpkg.commons-lab.org/kg/>
SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT(?wikidataID)) as ?count)
WHERE {
 ?annotation a ns1:Annotation .
 ?annotation ns1:has_InChIkey2D ?ik2d .
 ?ik2d ns1:is_InChIkey2D_of ?ik .
 ?ik ns1:has_wd_id ?wikidataID
}

PREFIX ns1: <https://enpkg.commons-lab.org/kg/>
PREFIX ns2: <https://enpkg.commons-lab.org/module/>
SELECT ?wikidataID
WHERE {
    ?chemicalEntity ns2:has_chembl_id ?chemblChemical .
    ?chemblChemical ns2:has_chembl_activity ?chemblAssayResults .
    ?chemblAssayResults ns2:target_id <ChEMBLTarget> .
    ?chemicalEntity ns1:has_wd_id ?wikidataID .
}

PREFIX ns1: <https://enpkg.commons-lab.org/kg/>
PREFIX ns2: <https://enpkg.commons-lab.org/module/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

SELECT ?InChIkey\nWHERE
    {  \n    ?InChIkey rdf:type ns1:InChIkey .
    ?InChIkey ns2:has_chembl_id ?chembl_id .
    ?InChIkey ns1:has_smiles ?smiles .
    ?chembl_id ns2:has_chembl_activity ?chembl_activity .
 ?chembl_activity ns2:target_id ?target .
?chembl_activity ns2:activity_type ?act_type .
        ?chembl_activity ns2:activity_value ?activity .
FILTER(regex(str(?target), ChEMBLTarget))
 FILTER(regex(str(?act_type), activity_type)) 
   FILTER(?activity < value)  
}
